scrolls.desc_cn: 随机变换全部手牌
scrolls.desc_en: Randomly change all cards in your hand
scrolls.desc_tw: 隨機變換全部手牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 副职业转为炼丹师。然后获得1张当前境界的副职牌。
scrolls.desc_en: Change your Side Job to Elixirist. Then gain a Side Job card of your current Phase.
scrolls.desc_tw: 副職業轉爲煉丹師。然後獲得1張當前境界的副職牌。

scrolls.desc_cn: 副职业转为符咒师。然后获得1张当前境界的副职牌。
scrolls.desc_en: Change your Side Job to Fuluist. Then gain a Side Job card of your current Phase.
scrolls.desc_tw: 副職業轉爲符咒師。然後獲得1張當前境界的副職牌。

scrolls.desc_cn: 副职业转为琴师。然后获得1张当前境界的副职牌。
scrolls.desc_en: Change your Side Job to Musician. Then gain a Side Job card of your current Phase.
scrolls.desc_tw: 副職業轉爲琴師。然後獲得1張當前境界的副職牌。

scrolls.desc_cn: 副职业转为画师。然后获得1张当前境界的副职牌。
scrolls.desc_en: Change your Side Job to Painter. Then gain a Side Job card of your current Phase.
scrolls.desc_tw: 副職業轉爲畫師。然後獲得1張當前境界的副職牌。

scrolls.desc_cn: 副职业转为阵法师。然后获得1张当前境界的副职牌。
scrolls.desc_en: Change your Side Job to Formation Master. Then gain a Side Job card of your current Phase.
scrolls.desc_tw: 副職業轉爲陣法師。然後獲得1張當前境界的副職牌。

scrolls.desc_cn: 副职业转为灵植师。然后获得1张当前境界的副职牌。
scrolls.desc_en: Change your Side Job to Plant Master. Then gain a Side Job card of your current Phase.
scrolls.desc_tw: 副職業轉爲靈植師。然後獲得1張當前境界的副職牌。

scrolls.desc_cn: 随机升级卡组或手牌{0}张1级牌

scrolls.desc_tw: 隨機升級卡組或手牌{0}張1級牌

scrolls.desc_en: Randomly upgrade {0} Lv.1 card(s) in your deck or hand
scrolls.desc_tw: 隨機升級卡組或手牌{0}張1級牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 随机升级卡组或手牌{0}张1级牌
scrolls.desc_en: Randomly upgrade {0} Lv.1 card(s) in your deck or hand
scrolls.desc_tw: 隨機升級卡組或手牌{0}張1級牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 命元变为{0}，换牌机会+{1}，生命上限+{2}，抽{3}张牌
scrolls.desc_en: Destiny becomes {0}, Exchange Chance + {1}, Max HP + {2}, Draw {3} cards
scrolls.desc_tw: 命元變爲{0}，換牌機會+{1}，生命上限+{2}，抽{3}張牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 本轮战斗若战败不会受到命元伤害
scrolls.desc_en: You do not take Destiny damage if you lose this round battle.
scrolls.desc_tw: 本輪戰鬥若戰敗不會受到命元傷害

scrolls.desc_cn: 修为减{0}，抽{1}张元婴牌
scrolls.desc_en: Lose {0} Cultivation, then draw {1} Immortality Phase cards
scrolls.desc_tw: 修爲减{0}，抽{1}張元嬰牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 修为减{0}，抽{1}张化神牌
scrolls.desc_en: Lose {0} Cultivation, then draw {1} Incarnation Phase cards
scrolls.desc_tw: 修爲减{0}，抽{1}張化神牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 修为减{0}，抽{1}张牌
scrolls.desc_en: Lose {0} Cultivation, then draw cards
scrolls.desc_tw: 修爲减{0}，抽{1}張牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 换牌机会+{0}
scrolls.desc_en: Exchange Chance + {0}
scrolls.desc_tw: 換牌機會+{0}

scrolls.desc_en: Cultivation + {0}

scrolls.desc_cn: 修为临时+{0}，本轮战斗开始前还原
scrolls.desc_en: Temporary gain {0} Cultivation until the start of this round of battle
scrolls.desc_tw: 修爲臨時+{0}，本輪戰鬥開始前還原

scrolls.desc_cn: 下一次炼化门派牌时将额外获得命元（炼气/筑基/金丹/元婴/化神牌分别为{0}/{1}/{2}/{3}/{4}命元，2级牌2倍，3级牌4倍）
scrolls.desc_en: The next time you Absorb Sect Card, you will gain additional Destiny ({0}/{1}/{2}/{3}/{4} Destiny for Meditation / Foundation / Virtuoso / Immortality / Incarnation card; 2x for Level 2 cards, 4x for Level 3 cards)
scrolls.desc_tw: 下一次煉化門派牌時將額外獲得命元（煉氣/築基/金丹/元嬰/化神牌分別爲{0}/{1}/{2}/{3}/{4}命元，2級牌2倍，3級牌4倍）

scrolls.desc_cn: 重新选择当前境界的仙命（删除旧仙命，但已触发的效果可保留）
scrolls.desc_en: Reselect the current phase's Immortal Fate (triggered effects do not disappear)
scrolls.desc_tw: 重新選擇當前境界的仙命（删除舊仙命，但已觸發的效果可保留）

scrolls.desc_cn: 自身立刻抽{0}张牌，其他角色在下轮开始时多抽{0}张牌
scrolls.desc_en: You draw {0} card immediately, and the other characters draw {0} card at the start of the next round.
scrolls.desc_tw: 自身立刻抽{0}張牌，其他角色在下輪開始時多抽{0}張牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 升级手牌和卡组中所有炼气期牌
scrolls.desc_en: Upgrade all Meditation Phase cards in your hand and deck.
scrolls.desc_tw: 升級手牌和卡組中所有煉氣期牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 修为减{0}，随机获得1张筑基期的2级牌
scrolls.desc_en: Lose {0} Cultivation, then gain a Foundation Phase card of Lv. 2
scrolls.desc_tw: 修爲减{0}，隨機獲得1張築基期的2級牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 修为减{0}，抽{1}张金丹期牌
scrolls.desc_en: Lose {0} Cultivation, then draw {1} Virtuoso Phase cards
scrolls.desc_tw: 修爲减{0}，抽{1}張金丹期牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 抽{0}张牌，但下场战斗开始时自身减{1}生命
scrolls.desc_en: Draw {0} cards, but reduce your HP by {1} at the start of your next battle.
scrolls.desc_tw: 抽{0}張牌，但下場戰鬥開始時自身减{1}生命

scrolls.desc_cn: 下一次炼化3级的门派牌时，升级自身卡组第1格的牌
scrolls.desc_en: The next time you Absorb a level 3 Sect card, upgrade the first card in your deck.
scrolls.desc_tw: 下一次煉化3級的門派牌時，升級自身卡組第1格的牌

scrolls.desc_cn: 通过道韵预感获得牌时额外复制1张（仅限1次）
scrolls.desc_en: The next time you gain a card through Daoist Rhyme Omen, gain an additional copy of that card.
scrolls.desc_tw: 通過道韵預感獲得牌時額外複製1張（僅限1次）

scrolls.desc_cn:
命元+{0}
(买空其他商品后才能购买酬宾之卷)
scrolls.desc_en:
Destiny + {0}
(You can only get it after you buy out other items)
scrolls.desc_tw:
命元+{0}
(買空其他商品後才能購買酬賓之卷)

pacts.desc_cn: 每轮开始前若换牌机会≥{0}，多加{1}次换牌机会
pacts.desc_en: If your Exchange Chance is greater than or equal to {0}, add {1} more Exchange Chance at the beginning of each round
pacts.desc_tw: 每輪開始前若換牌機會≥{0}，多加{1}次換牌機會

pacts.desc_cn: 每轮开始前若换牌机会为{0}，多加{1}次换牌机会
pacts.desc_en: If your Exchange Chance is {0}, add {1} more Exchange Chance at the beginning of each round
pacts.desc_tw: 每輪開始前若換牌機會爲{0}，多加{1}次換牌機會

pacts.desc_cn: 每次战斗胜利后永久加{0}生命上限
pacts.desc_en: Gain {0} Max HP permanently after winning each battle.
pacts.desc_tw: 每次戰鬥勝利後永久加{0}生命上限

pacts.desc_cn: 若卡组中有普通攻击，每次战斗结束后永久加{0}生命上限
pacts.desc_en: If there is a Normal Attack in your deck, permanently add {0} Max HP at the end of each battle
pacts.desc_tw: 若卡組中有普通攻擊，每次戰鬥結束後永久加{0}生命上限

pacts.desc_cn: 每保留2张手牌，战斗开始时依次升级卡组中的1张1级牌（持续到战斗结束）
pacts.desc_en: For each 2 cards you keep in your hand, upgrade 1 Level 1 card in your deck in turn at the start of each battle (lasts until the end of the battle)
pacts.desc_tw: 每保留2張手牌，戰鬥開始時依次升級卡組中的1張1級牌（持續到戰鬥結束）

pacts.desc_cn: 战斗开始时，双方各加{0}生命及上限
pacts.desc_en: At the start of each battle, both players add {0} HP and Max HP
pacts.desc_tw: 戰鬥開始時，雙方各加{0}生命及上限

pacts.desc_cn: 战斗开始时，双方各减{0}生命及上限
pacts.desc_en: At the start of each battle, both players lose {0} HP and Max HP
pacts.desc_tw: 戰鬥開始時，雙方各减{0}生命及上限

pacts.desc_cn: 炼化门派牌时，2级牌加1换牌机会，3级牌加2换牌机会
pacts.desc_en: When you Absorb a Sect Card, add 1 Exchange Chance for level 2 card, and 2 Exchange Chance for level 3 card
pacts.desc_tw: 煉化門派牌時，2級牌加1換牌機會，3級牌加2換牌機會

pacts.desc_cn: 取消换牌机会储存上限
pacts.desc_tw: 取消換牌機會儲存上限

pacts.desc_cn: 若自身命元小于对方，战斗开始时升级卡组中的{0}张牌（取从左至右第1张可升级的牌）
pacts.desc_en: If your Destiny is less than your opponent's, upgrade {0} cards in your deck at the start of battle (take the first upgradeable card from left to right)
pacts.desc_tw: 若自身命元小于對方，戰鬥開始時升級卡組中的{0}張牌（取從左至右第1張可升級的牌）

pacts.desc_cn: 每轮开始时减{0}命元（最低减至1），多加{1}次换牌机会
pacts.desc_en: Lose {0} Destiny at the start of each round (minimum to 1), and gain {1} Exchange Chance
pacts.desc_tw: 每輪開始時减{0}命元（最低减至1），多加{1}次換牌機會

pacts.desc_cn:
加入暗谷，永远忠于玄巳（请隐藏你的身份，不要告诉别人）
俸禄：每轮多加{0}次换牌机会
pacts.desc_en:
Join the Dark Valley and stay loyal to Xuan Si forever (please hide your identity and don't tell anyone)
Salary: add {0} more Exchange Chance per round
pacts.desc_tw:
加入暗谷，永遠忠于玄巳（請隱藏你的身份，不要告訴別人）
俸祿：每輪多加{0}次換牌機會

pacts.desc_cn: 战斗开始时双方各获得{0}层加攻
pacts.desc_en: At the start of battle, each player gains {0} stack of [Increase ATK]
pacts.desc_tw: 戰鬥開始時雙方各獲得{0}層加攻

pacts.desc_cn: 之后每次突破境界时减{0}生命上限并加{1}修为
pacts.desc_en: Each time you breakthrough the Phase, you will lose {0} Max HP and gain {1} Cultivation.
pacts.desc_tw: 之後每次突破境界時减{0}生命上限幷加{1}修爲

pacts.desc_cn: 常规抽牌和换牌时优先获得门派牌，排除副职牌
pacts.desc_en: You will priority get the Sect Cards rather than Side Job Cards during regular card draws and card exchanges.
pacts.desc_tw: 常規抽牌和換牌時優先獲得門派牌，排除副職牌

pacts.desc_cn: 使用最后1次换牌机会时，优先换出和自身同境界的牌
pacts.desc_en: When you use your last Exchange Chance to change a card, you will priority get the card of your Phase
pacts.desc_tw: 使用最後1次換牌機會時，優先換出和自身同境界的牌

pacts.desc_cn: 每轮开始抽到的牌中随机一张变为2级
pacts.desc_en: One of the cards drawn at the beginning of each round will be upgraded to level 2.
pacts.desc_tw: 每輪開始抽到的牌中隨機一張變爲2級
